data.expected_result: The channel is no longer unread when the only message is deleted, or clicking on the channel erases the Unread indicator for it
data.short_description: If the only message is deleted in a new server channel, it sticks as an unread channel for server members despite clicking on it
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new channel - Send one single message - Delete the said message - Other users on the server who haven't seen that message will be stuck in a permanent Channel Unread state for that channel
